column5: Lovely & Cozy Guesthouse is very roomy @ almost 600 sq. ft. with all the comforts & privacy of home w/ Free Cable TV, ROKU & WIFI.    -Non-Smoking home    -Fully equipped kitchen with, full size refrigerator (with condiments)    -Stovetop   -Microwave    -Keurig single serve coffee maker (K-Pods)   -Everything you need to enjoy meals at home & storage containers for leftovers.   Guest House can sleep 7 adults and 1 infant in crib.
column8: Lovely & Cozy Cottage w/ Keyless Code Entry
